```{r}
NY$mgrent <- gsub("[^0-9]", "", NY$mgrent)
NY$mgrent <- as.numeric(NY$mgrent)

agg_NY <- aggregate(NY[,57:58], by = list(NY$year, NY$sba), FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)
colnames(agg_NY) <- c("Year", "Sub-Borough","Avg Rent", "Avg Income")
```
